description:
A personal injury can cause much more than physical pain. Financial strain, trouble working and other stressors can interfere with your recovery. The St. Louis, Missouri, law firm of Halvorsen Klote understands how quickly matters can spiral out of control and how difficult it can be to get back on your feet. We use the free initial consultation to get to know you, understand the details of your case and explore your legal options. If we agree to work together, we will immediately get to work gathering evidence, preparing arguments and, ultimately, doing what is necessary to ensure you secure the maximum victory possible.

Personal injuries come in all shapes and sizes, and they can stem from any number of everyday and not-so-everyday events. When attorney Joel Halvorsen and attorney Greg Klote founded our law firm, they did so with the knowledge that to help the most people, they must prepare to take on a broad range of cases. Through extensive education, hard work and dedication, that is precisely what they did. Today, the duo - along with attorney Samantha Orlowski - competently handles the following types of cases:

  • Car accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Commercial vehicle accidents
  • Workers' compensation
  • Construction accidents
  • Animal bites
  • Brain injury
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Assault and battery
  • Sexual abuse
  • Premises liability
  • Products liability
  • Wrongful death

Our team at the law firm of Halvorsen Klote prides on providing superior legal representation in a personalized atmosphere, including through virtual appointments. We believe that strong communication and trust are the cornerstones of any successful attorney-client relationship and that a team approach is the best approach to victory.
